The Star that Fell to Earth is a classic tale of a fallen angel by with a twist.
In this version, the fallen angel is not just a simple being but a powerful sorcerer who possesses magical abilities.
The story follows the protagonist as they navigate through a world where magic is forbidden and must use their powers to survive.
Along the way, they meet other fallen angels and must form alliances to take down the and restore magic to the world.
The story takes a dark turn when the protagonist discovers that the reason for the ban on magic is not what they thought it was, and they must confront their own demons to save the world.
